author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, part of the migrations in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404.
Removed most of the CMSDEPRECATED_X warnings in the `DQM/Si*` and all in `DQM/Track*` and `DQMOffline/CalibTracker` subsystems from [CMSSW_12_3_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2022-02-21-2300](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/showBuildLogs.py/slc7_amd64_gcc10/www/mon/12.3.CMSDEPRECATED-mon-23/CMSSW_12_3_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2022-02-21-2300)

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: migrate away from deprecated APIs in the DQM subsystem
